website_summaries.verdict: A space-saving heavy freestanding bag with a narrow profile that fits almost anywhere inside.
pros: Tall profile allows you to practice a variety of martial art techniques and exercises including ground techniques
Features durable vinyl shell and pre-filled sand base
Bag stores in small closets and corners when not in use
cons: Bag lacks rigidity when striking the very top and can sway or fall to the ground

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Purchase . . . Best Bag Ever . . . at my age and still doing martial arts, hitting a heavy bag that doesn't "give" ends up hurting more than helping. . . . also, heavy bags don't move (and opponents do!) . . . this bag moves, returns to origin, gives realistically like a sparring partner and allows for a full range of strikes, upper, lower, mid, forearm, spinning . . . everything . . . SO MUCH better than my old hanging Everlast . . . BUY THIS!! You will NOT be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Wulff

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and tell but it can’t keep straight. The top part and the bottom part are connected with a zipper. And that causes the top part tilted when I hit it. I had to ask my roommate to hold the top part for me when I use it.... Otherwise, it will just keep tilting and I eventually won’t be able to hit the bag...
customer_reviews.author: Hsiao-Fang Lin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want a Heavy Bag. Returns customer has to pay shipping and it is over $150 dollars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is NOT meant as a heavy bag. Do NOT buy it if you are planning to hit it with any power as you will knock it over first punch. I bought it and didn't understand this and I can't even get a good workout on it. To top it off it isn't even worth returning it because the shipping costs has to be paid by the customer and it costs over $!50 dollars to ship due to the size of the boxes and the weight of the base. Biggest waste of money don't buy this to try it because the return process sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brit's Family

customer_reviews.title: I was quite happy with this stand up bag
customer_reviews.text: I was quite happy with this stand up bag. It is the first and only one that I have ever owned, so I have nothing to compare it with, but it takes kicks, punches, elbows, hammer fists, etc. really well. I've had it for a few months by now, and it has held up though it has taken a very heavy beating (I'm not the only one hitting it--my boyfriend was a professional boxer, and his 9-year-old kid loves abusing it too). Random note: my cat hasn't been scratching it at all, so I guess that's a minor plus, for people who might be worried about that. :P
customer_reviews.author: ZenithStorm

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this bag
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this bag, it performed better than I expected. Pros: 1. Can use it upright or down for MMA. 2. Bag is heavy enough that it doesnt easily tip over. 3. Base is stable the bag moves but does not rock. 4. Has handles to practice clinches and knees. 5. Comes with a base that you dont need to fill. 6. Very easy assembly. 7. Base is small and not bulky. 8. Can be used for low kicks. Cons: 1. Bag is floating on the base instead of directly connected this makes it more stable but the bag is not perfectly upright.
customer_reviews.author: Ludwig Marko

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: The best to build a sleep-over/yurt/Harry potters tent! We have 2 simulator of the best of the best and the century one it’s great for kids and for soft impact, it won’t hurt nor break your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dama

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect bag for kick boxing
customer_reviews.text: A slim profile that's not too easy to knock over.....but it you do knock it over, just jump on it and keep on punching :P Our teenage daughter does kick boxing. Her and her friends totally enjoy smacking this around. It's supper sturdy and made of excellent material...not cheap at all. All pro!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Toledo

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use but do not mistake this for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for light use but do not mistake this for a heavy bag substitute for full strength leg kicks.... Easy to put together and quality material... Shipped as described. I use it everyday and it has stood up to solid use without looking worn...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, not good for boxing!
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is very nice, feels good quality and resistant. The heavy pre-filled base is very easy to assemble (just and zipper and you’re done!) The reason for the three stars is because we bought it for boxing and this does not stand a punch! I am not trained nor particularly strong but can lay it flat with no difficulty. Does not work for us!
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Walk away
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! I was under the impression that this was an adult punching bag but more suitable for toddlers. If you plan on any decent training from this turn away. It falls to the ground with the low kick! Bottom line unless your 2 and under or above the age of 90 this is not the bag for you.
customer_reviews.author: natasha browne

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far. Some of the reviews here talk about this being too easy to knock over. If you hit it hard at neck/face height, it will fall over, but that's what it's designed to do. We can jab/cross all the way around without knocking it over. If you're kicking waist height or lower, you'll have to kick it extremely hard to knock it over. The base weighs 110 lbs and seems very durable. This isn't a heavy bag. It's more of a striking bag. The foam doesn't weigh much at all. All the weight is in the heavy sand base. If you have the room to drag it around, that's a great workout too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stress-reliever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this punching bag for my home because I have angst-y teenagers. When one slams their keyboard, or shows some other sign of just needing to vent frustration, instead of telling them to stop, we now redirect them to the punching bag with a bit of humor. Worked like a charm. This particular punching bag is heavy enough to get a hard hit on, but doesn't need to hang, so it can be moved anywhere we need it. It's particularly satisfying when you hit it hard enough to knock it over, then step on the end to get it to come back up and punch it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hitting bag
customer_reviews.text: Great hitting bag. My last bag was a 75lb hanger that Kept falling out of the ceiling so I went with the free standing style. Far more Versatel as it's designed more for MMA style hitting plus kicks & take down moves. The base stays put. The way it sways when hit feels more realistic. Easy assembly in minutes. I recommend this over any traditional boxing bag.
customer_reviews.author: jerry milton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worthless
customer_reviews.text: I could've just stuffed some clothes into a large duffel bag and had a superior bag to punch and kick on. This bag is absolutely worthless. It's like a little kid pop-up punching bag. The fact that it is so expensive is beyond absurd. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE I DID. THIS IS AN ABSOLUTE WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Really dig this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a heavy bag, so if you buy it expecting that type of experience you will be disappointed. That being said, this is a great product capable of providing high intensity yet low impact training. You just have to adapt your workout to this type of bag. You have to be more Ali than Foreman. Blasting away at a 140lb bag is great but so is knocking this thing over and getting into some ground & pound or throwing strikes with it in your guard or even using it as a stretching partner. I was apprehensive but I'm extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CatPax

customer_reviews.title: Great for tae kwon do and karate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade from the older versions with the large plastic base that needs to be filled with sand or water. It’s more versatile and easier to move. I’ve read negative reviews, but it seems to come from people mistaking this as a replacement for a heavy bag. If that’s what you want, this is not for you. Attaching the two pieces was very easy. Nice and tall and convenient that you don’t have to adjust the height. The only reason I don’t give five stars is that it has a slight but permanent lean to it. But still, I prefer this product over the competitors.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Digging this new toy
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Though it does rock a fair amount as expected. You can combo well and move around with it, though I would not be laying haymakers into it or you'll just knock it all the way down. Easy to assemble. If it starts leaning to one side just switch to the other side or stomp down on the sand and it should shape right up. I use it every day for kicks, punches, knees, elbows, takedowns, hammer fists. Super versatile I love it.
customer_reviews.author: RykkiMidnyt

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Great item to practice kick boxing, boxing, self defense, and it is a good outlet for teenagers who are looking for an appropriate way to blow off steam. It has held up well and doesn’t need a ton of space. It was a little more than I wanted to pay, however, spending the extra money for a quality product paid off.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This punching bag is awesome! Be careful when setting it up and moving the base - it is heavy. When zipping it, try to push/pull the top toward the bottom and it will be a cake. Love working out to it and my kids love to punch/kick it as well. It's a fantastic idea.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia G

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with my purchase. I bought this to turn my spare room into a gym during covid. This is NOT a heavy bag but great for working light combos and stamina. All of the weight is in the base so there is a lot of reaction from the bag upon impact. I do not mean this as negative, just setting expectations. Had a little trouble putting this together alone with the zipper but I am a little dense sometimes. :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. It doesn’t take a crazy amount of space like a heavy bag and stand. I can’t mount a heavy bag to ceiling either, so this was the next choice! I’m glad we went this route.
customer_reviews.author: WAMOT11

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for great workout. I am 6’3” and my son is 6’ and almost didn’t order because thought product was too short. Not at all- great for our heights! Durable and very well made. My son cleared piano and other stuff out of a room for his full contact workout! You can punch it, tackle it, etc
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight on the top. One punch sends it to the ground. Great for my 9 year old though!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great way to let your anger out, however it begins to lean over time after hitting it. But I still love it and would buy agian.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE punching and kicking this bag!! I have been missing my MMA gym since COVID hit but this bag more than makes up for not being able to go to the gym. It was very easy to assemble, can take solid punches and roundhouse kicks and comes back for more. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.text: My only problem with it, for me is when I'm boxing it shifts on the ground constantly I have to pull it back in place, like it's not heavy enough. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, hitting it too hard, lol.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jabbar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, could be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Product came separately into 2 boxes. Easy to put together (zip the base to the upright bag). The bag feels solid when hitting/kicking but will certainly bow down with excessive contact. My wife uses it for a cardio workout. I use it to take out stress.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, only thing is I wish the top was heavier - I'm ~135lbs but when I strike it it's falls back too easily. If you're ~ the same size or bigger than me, you may need to look into stuffing it before you can go all out. Other than that, super easily to assemble and quality is good!
customer_reviews.author: En

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that I wasn’t gonna be able to hit the bag with everything I had but I can actually go all out wit it and I really like it. Something to know the bag and the base arrive in different days I didn’t knew that was gonna be the case but I contacted the seller and I got an answer real quick with the tracking information for the second package. Overall I’m happy with the product and the assistance from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: fantastic standing heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic heavy bag. I've been using it every day for the past month in quarantine and it remains in great condition. Sometimes it leans after ground and pound or heavy hitting but it always resets to original form. Only thing to note is that it takes two people to move the base which is 110lbs I believe, but its easy to set up (just zips together).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 12 year old boy. He LOVES it and he uses it daily. He uses it to practice/imitate WWE moves, so it has taken a beating. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G

customer_reviews.title: Endless entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Adore this thing! It's definitely for a smaller person like me, otherwise you'll be sending the thing flying! When I attempt kicks it slowly nudges across the floor. But a love it, my neighbors are probably concerned about what the ruckus is about and I have a lot of fun. Let me tell you though, you need an assistant to zip the first part to the second. I went through quite a struggle to keep it standing upright, and the zipper was so hard to pull along that I had a bruise on my finger for about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Geiling

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and kids are SUPER happy with this!!! We all love using it and it is amazing for the kids to learn with even though it's adult size. Great for take downs and regular lunching bag training as well!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Barney

customer_reviews.title: The height is great but it’s so light weight
customer_reviews.text: The height is great but it’s so light weight. I wish the top of it was heavier for more resistance when you punch or kick.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi R.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Don’t buy from this seller. They are shaded too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy piece of equipment. I had read that is was difficult to align the zipper, but having a person holding the top piece upright allowed it be done in just a minute flat. I like that I can easily move it out of the way when the room is being used for other purposes. Very happy with the speedy delivery, everything I hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Adults and Kids
customer_reviews.text: I was able to set this up in a minute or two without any real struggle and the balance, material, and impact are all very satisfying. We are very happy with our purchase. FYI: Package arrives in two separate boxes that may or may not arrive on the same day together. Showed up as "Delivered" on Amazon but the seller kept me informed as to when to expect the 2nd box.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Comer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I needed a heavy bag but had no way to hang one. This bag is by far the best out there. No need to add sand or water to the base.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yehl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for anger management and have been enjoying it so far. it does move across the room but that's kinda fun. You can see how much power you're putting into your punches as it moves about. I like that you can kick it and throw it to the ground too.
customer_reviews.author: Rakeesha Wrigley

customer_reviews.title: Good Clean Fun
customer_reviews.text: I would've given 5 stars, but it is a bit too easy to knock down, and doesn't spring back as fast as I would like. However I am an ex prize fighter and retired stuntman, so my needs are a bit different from most. Barring those two things, it is great on my joints, and it is great for kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Had a unique problem, but the equipment is solid
customer_reviews.text: I found a living wasp in the base of the punching bag that was delivered. After killing the wasp, the equipment went together easily (would recommend two people), is very sturdy, and took one hell of a beating. :)
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Only for little kids
customer_reviews.text: It was too easy to knock over, it was too easy for my 11 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Cubsmom

customer_reviews.title: Very good if space constrained but want quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with this product and it’s quality. Searched for months for a real punching bag that could withstand hits, but didn’t require pounds of sand or water or a support beam to hang it or 12ft ceilings. Very solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Moomie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very sturdy and extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Capuano

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible target for offensive traditional Tae Kwon Do and Sport Karate. Get a Bob or a regular Wavemaster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at home striking bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during the pandemic as I could not go to the dojo. Great at home solution for all strikes. I'm 6'0 and 190lbs and can strike it hard without it going all the way over. Seller was a good communicator and the 2 boxes came fast. I liked that the base is pre-filled.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a great use for exercising
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and a great use for exercising. Tends to lean a bit, but all the more reason to let out some aggression, and by the time you are finished you are too exhausted to write a more discouraging review. In all honesty it was an excellent purchase, now I just wish I had some ground mats.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came back up all the way straight, but very satisfied with everything else. It can be used for punching, kicking, tackling, and some ground defense training.
customer_reviews.author: mrgff522

customer_reviews.title: Slim and heavy
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for my small apartment. It's all the resistance and ruggedness I need packed into a slim design.
customer_reviews.author: RunJaneRun

customer_reviews.title: Very good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! The only thing I don't like is that it is nearly impossible for me to throw combinations at the speed I like since the bag tips over too easily. Aside from that, it is an amazing product and perfect if you are worried about noise!
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Kristofak

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for for our family. Easy to put together and durable.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a year
customer_reviews.text: My sixteen year old son got about a year's worth of mma training on it. He did everything to it, running flying kicks, body slamming and all that fun stuff. The stitching on the bottom started giving way and the sand started leeking. He is yr typical teenager with all that pent up energy, he still uses it for some ground work but it no longer stays up. ITs a nice bag for 240 dollars. Would i buy it again? Yes i would. He spent hrs after school beating it up and more during the summer. It was worth the money.:)
customer_reviews.author: Nestor

customer_reviews.title: it's worth buying
customer_reviews.text: the bag can take a lot of punishment and it is perfect for low and high kicks,it gives you one hell of a workout.
customer_reviews.author: lg3hree

customer_reviews.title: Century verses fight simulator
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I love that the sections were already filled with sand and foam. It has an excellent feel to striking it, very responsive, rebounds well. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expected it to be. In my opinion, an improvement over the Wavemaster.
customer_reviews.author: WKB 33919

customer_reviews.title: Great as long as price doesn’t get gauged
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Tall. (I’m 5’8 and it’s taller than I). Foam top zippered onto a soft weighted base. 2 boxes. Not easy to knock down. Satisfying to beat up during a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Breuer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell I didn’t get all the parts the base bag was missing WTF it only has 3 parts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Doyle

customer_reviews.title: but do recommend two people put it together
customer_reviews.text: arrived within a few days from placing order. comes in two seperate packages. instructions for assembly are straight forward, but do recommend two people put it together....only took 10 minutes. 13 year old is very strong kicker, but this bag can handle it. very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MJD65

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It moves and that is always nice in making sure your not staying in one sport when doing drills! My daughter and I love it and drills have never been so fun at home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Best free standing bag I have encountered so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nick River

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because of the reactivity as well as the different options you have with this bag it makes it a really cool bag. I actually took it traveling with me due to how portable it is, you can use it in your hotel as long as you have a little room.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hartl

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use this daily and it holds up to heavy punching and kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great punching back for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great for practicing martial arts - punches, kicks etc. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MKRC 2000

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool I wish it weighed a little more for me my boys are equal to its weight so they can kick it and it doesn’t fly across the room
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. McNamer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Heavy so it stays in place. Purchased this for a 10 year boy and 12 year old girl. They use it for practicing karate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and stable bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bag. Karate Joe's was fantastic to work with. Very quick ship.
customer_reviews.author: John Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Small in size, huge in value
customer_reviews.text: A very durable training bag. While it is easy to knock down with a strong punch or kick, so are a lot of people... There are so many uses for the bag that my son and I have had many hours of fun working out with it. Form kicks, to punches, to take downs, to anger management, to joke delivery; your imagination is your limit. Highly recommend this bag for any gym, because it takes up such little space and has countless uses.
customer_reviews.author: Maranatha

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is portable.
customer_reviews.text: Good for a general workout. I prefer a traditional hanging heavy bag, but I had nowhere to hang it. I like that it is portable.
customer_reviews.author: Erock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag meets all my needs in mma training definitely I would recommend this bag for punching and kicking and also for takedowns.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the perfect (and only, as far as I could find) solution for not being able to hang a bag. It works great, looks awesome, and seems like it will really take a beating. Warning: the base is SUPER heavy. The delivery person may be a bit cranky upon delivery...and be sure you are ready to really lift something super heavy to move it somewhere whenever it needs to be moved. That being said, the weight is what makes this a super high quality product. After a lot of research on freestanding boxing bags, I'm VERY pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Items arrive separately
customer_reviews.text: The shipping information is not accurate, it will say delivered when items are missing. Once everything arrived it was exactly as expected. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey O'Hare

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves it. He is very into martial arts. It's just like the one his studio uses. Very durable. Great for ground and pound as well.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer prahach

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Perfect weight and balance for medium amount of force and footwork.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled leave it alone just to be on age side and pull with strap at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was not sure about the assembly, but after starting to zip and pressing down at the top it unbelievably zipped to perfection
customer_reviews.author: Casual

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it. i do eliptical and this for cardio. my son uses too.
customer_reviews.author: lester borrayes

customer_reviews.title: Very good bag. Probably could get a heavier one
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag. Probably could get a heavier one, but one works fine for students in developing their leg strength, accuracy for their kicks, and other power techniques. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The kids, my wife, and I have used it daily. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Spenner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She uses the exact same one at ATA.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: We love this. My husband and I use it very ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. My husband, kids, and I use it often. It's sturdy and heavy. You can get a great workout. Only one minor complaint is that it leans to one side and doesn't stand straight up.
customer_reviews.author: NYsportsMom!

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We use it frequently in our house. If you have limited space this bag will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, two separate shipments
customer_reviews.text: Product is well designed. Great for the versatility it's intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Doane

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using it
customer_reviews.text: Finally got this today. It was fun hitting it around. However, you might need a helping hand to set it up
customer_reviews.author: Armand C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but leans during a workout.
customer_reviews.text: Good. Have to straighten up after one workout so I go around it.
customer_reviews.author: unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heavy bag for adults and children.
customer_reviews.text: I signed my six-year-old daughter to mix martial arts and she trains with a heavy bag. So we decided to look for a bag that would be right for her but could also be used by adults. This bag fit our needs perfectly, it is tall enough for adults to use and the base is low enough so a child can kick without kicking the base. It is heavy as it says in the description and it's kept together by a zipper that attaches the base to the foam punching part. It's great quality and seems like it will last us for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa F. NJ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before making my final decision on which bag to buy. I'm used to the hanging heavy bags at the kickboxing gym, but really didn't have a great spot to hang one in my own home. Looked at all of the free-standing options and this one seemed to fit exactly what I was looking for... And it's PERFECT! Would definitely recommend to anyone searching for a free-standing bag!
customer_reviews.author: MiracleGirl

customer_reviews.title: This punching bag is so awesome! I used it in the living room
customer_reviews.text: This punching bag is so awesome! I used it in the living room, in my gym, in the backyard. You can transport it anywhere. It pretty much is a punching bag, and grappling partner. I just punch and pound the crap out of it and it just bounces back. Extremely well made, I hardly dented the bag and I have put it in hard abuse. I even hold on to the base to do leg raises. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Best freestanding Thai bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the best freestanding Thai bag out and it’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Manny Papasavvas

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchase i have done for myself...I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Primeau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product by far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product by far! The height, width and weight is perfect. Made of superior quality materials this will definitely last a long time. My wife and I really enjoy this stand up bag. Such a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: ARMANDO A FERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: It comes with sand! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research. Love this one. I like that the base is small so it doesn't take up much room, also you can use the entire bag and do lower work unlike hard plastic bases. You can tuck your feet in straps and do punching sit-ups. Sturdy and quality. It moves a smidge but nothing where it is an inconvienience. Great price. One of the few where the sand is already is the base. No funnels or bags of sand to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag. Easy to use and move around
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag. Easy to use and move around. Very easy to store away as well. Had this bag for about a month now and I use it three to four times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as we saw it in the local store. Terrific for teens to beat up! Super heavy duty and came with base already filled.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace my traditional heavy bag and stand. This thing is pretty mobile. It's like a good replacement especially for inside. It seem to be well made. So no complaints as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for punching and kicking!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wanted something you didn't have to hang from your ceiling. Also wanted something that you didn't have to fill with water or sand. Very sturdy. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: JBAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Great for Adult and child!! Easy to pick back up if falls over and move around!
customer_reviews.author: ANON YMOUS

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: very stable when hitting and easy to put together also. I like the feel of it when pounding, bounces back quickly.
customer_reviews.author: anatta

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! So well made
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! So well made! It was very easy to put together. I'm having so much fun with my workouts!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted to add to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a trained or training boxer but I like to use bags for general fitness work and this was perfect. I like the standing bag so I don't have to hang it. It is well constructed from good materials so I expect it to last me years. It comes with exercise program(s) which helps give anyone ideas for different exercises using the bag. It's perfect for my use!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Pleased .
customer_reviews.text: I have used one in class and knew what I was getting. I am pleased with bag .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy base and can be moved out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy base and can be moved out of the way when not in use; more versatile than hanging bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Century Versys Fight Simulator (with 10184B Base)
product_meta.description: The most versatile system on the market, the versys fight simulator is ideal for both Stand-Up and ground training. More than three times the striking surface of a standard bag. Combines the uses of a standard freestanding bag with those of a grappling dummy. Provides you with the most realistic workout next to partner training. The movement of bag improves timing and reflexes when striking. Top and bottom handles allow a multitude of workouts including dragging, knee strikes, sit ups, leg lifts, resistance band workouts and more. Base is filled with sand and weighs approx. 100 lbs
feature_bullets: The most versatile System on the market
Ideal for both Stand-Up and ground training
Provides you with the most realistic workout next to partner training
